text: Gabriel Abossolo (16 January 1939 – 9 November 2014) was a Cameroonian professional footballer who played as a defensive midfielder. == Career == His career played out almost exclusively under the colours of Bordeaux where he played for 11 seasons. == References == == External links == * Profile on su pari-et-gagne.com * Category:1939 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Yaoundé Category:Association football defenders Category:Cameroonian footballers Category:Ligue 1 players Category:Stade Poitevin FC players Category:FC Girondins de Bordeaux players Category:Cameroon international footballers Category:1970 African Cup of Nations players Category:Cameroonian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in France Category:Cameroonian expatriate sportspeople in France
title: Gabriel Abossolo
